## EditorSearchComponent interface

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface EditorSearchComponent extends AbstractSearchComponent
```

**Extends:** [AbstractSearchComponent](./obsidian-typings.abstractsearchcomponent.md)

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[clear()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.clear.md)

</td><td>

Remove all highlights from editor.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[findNext()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.findnext.md)

</td><td>

Find next search results from cursor and highlights it.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[findNextOrReplace()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.findnextorreplace.md)

</td><td>

Replace cursor with replacement string if not null and moves to next search result.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[findPrevious()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.findprevious.md)

</td><td>

Find previous search results from cursor and highlights it.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[hide()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.hide.md)

</td><td>

Hide/detaches the search component and removes cursor highlights.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[highlight(ranges)](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.highlight.md)

</td><td>

Add highlights for specified ranges.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onAltEnter(e)](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.onaltenter.md)

</td><td>

Highlights all matches if search element focused.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onModAltEnter(e)](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.onmodaltenter.md)

</td><td>

Replace all search results with specified text if replace mode and replacement element is focused.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[onSearchInput()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.onsearchinput.md)

</td><td>

Updates search cursor on new input query and highlights search results.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[replaceAll()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.replaceall.md)

</td><td>

Replaces all search results with replacement query.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[replaceCurrentMatch()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.replacecurrentmatch.md)

</td><td>

Replace current search result, if any, with replacement query.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[searchAll()](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.searchall.md)

</td><td>

Find all matches of search query and highlights them.

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[show(replace)](./obsidian-typings.editorsearchcomponent.show.md)

</td><td>

Reveal the search (and replace) component.

</td></tr>
